name: Gothic
description: An animation inspired by glass window by Gerhard Richter in the Cathedral in Köln in Germany. This was my proposal for a similar window in the Basilica of the Sacred Heart (situated in the Suburb of Koekelberg) in Brussels. Only it would not be a window but a very large flatscreen. So I dreamt. Thanks once again to Jared “Levitated” Tarbell. 2009 CR 586 https://hansup.be/2009_gothic_animation_hans-verhaegen.html
